actions.name: add_worksheet
actions.display_name: Add a Worksheet to a Workbook
actions.description: Add a worksheet to a workbook

actions.name: append_multiple_rows
actions.description: Appends multiple row of values to a worksheet.

actions.name: append_row
actions.description: Append row of values to a worksheet

actions.name: append_table_rows
actions.description: Append rows to a table

actions.name: clear_range
actions.description: Clear a block of cells (range) content or formatting.

actions.name: clear_column
actions.description: Clear contents/formatting of a column by its index.

actions.name: clear_row
actions.description: Clear contents/formatting of an entire row by its ID.

actions.name: clear_worksheet
actions.description: Clear a worksheet

actions.name: convert_to_range
actions.description: Converts a table to a range

actions.name: create_table
actions.description: Create a table in a worksheet

actions.name: createWorkbook
actions.description: Create a new workbook at the specified location

actions.name: create_worksheet
actions.description: Add a new worksheet (tab) to an existing workbook with optional default headers.

actions.name: delete_table
actions.description: Delete a table from a worksheet

actions.name: delete_workbook
actions.description: Delete a workbook

actions.name: delete_worksheet
actions.description: Delete a worksheet in a workbook

actions.name: find_row
actions.description: Locate a row by specifying a lookup column and value (e.g. find a row where “ID” = 123).

actions.name: find-workbook
actions.description: Finds an existing workbook by name.

actions.name: find-worksheet
actions.description: Finds an existing worksheet by name.

actions.name: get_range
actions.description: Retrieve the values in a given cell range (e.g., “A1:C10”).

actions.name: getRowById
actions.description: Retrieve the entire content of a row by its row ID.

actions.name: get_table_columns
actions.description: List columns of a table in a worksheet

actions.name: get_table_rows
actions.description: List rows of a table in a worksheet

actions.name: get_workbooks
actions.description: Retrieve a list of workbooks

actions.name: get_worksheet
actions.description: Retrieve metadata of a worksheet by its ID.

actions.name: get_worksheet_rows
actions.description: Retrieve rows from a worksheet

actions.name: get_worksheets
actions.description: Retrieve worksheets from a workbook

actions.name: get-worksheet-columns
actions.description: List columns of a worksheet.

actions.name: lookup_table_column
actions.description: Lookup a value in a table column in a worksheet

actions.name: rename_worksheet
actions.description: Change the name of an existing worksheet.

actions.name: update_row
actions.description: Update a row in a worksheet

actions.name: custom_api_call
actions.description: Make a custom API call
